name: Chin Tuck
how_to_perform:
1. Lie on your back with your knees bent and feet flat on the floor.
2. Engage your core muscles by drawing your belly button towards your spine.
3. Slowly tuck your chin in towards your chest, keeping your head straight and your neck long.
4. Hold this position for a brief moment (about 1-2 seconds).
5. Gradually release back to the starting position, maintaining engagement in your core muscles throughout the exercise.
short_summary: Chin Tucks are an isometric exercise that targets the abs, helping to strengthen and stabilize the body's core region.
